library(tidyverse)

# Import data set
```{r}
lobster_abundance <- read_csv(here("data", "Lobster_Abundance_All_Years_20210412.csv"), 
                              na = "-99999") |> 
  clean_names() |> 
  uncount(count) #creates a separate observation (row) for each lobster seen rather than having them batched. 
```
